TopicTitle: A man in Indonesia was beaten and jailed for challenging the existence of god.

Articles.Content:
This petition will help bring the attention of this horrific atrocity by the corrupt and evil Indonesian government to the President if it can get 25,000 signatures in the next 28 days.

Everyone, try your hardest to make a difference here. This man is rotting in jail for 2 years. We must fix this!

The YouTube video explaining the situation:

A Time for Action (MIRROR)

The petition on the White House website:

https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/call-upon-indonesian-government-respect-freedom-and-dignity-all-its-citizens-and-free-alexander-aan/vYBQzxXy
This is pretty sad. We live in the 21st century for crying out loud!

The reaction to his statements, beatings and punishment is clearly excessive but I can not blame the Indonesians for wanting to preserve their culture. They have a right to do so as does each nation. I shall sign to protest the severity of the penalty.
